winterx/color4bg.js

Generates dynamic abstract backgrounds using WebGL

Related repos

  • background patterns and gradients for web projects
  • Colorizes wallpapers with custom palettes using the browser Canvas API
  • Desktop color palette generator that creates schemes from images
  • Color mixing library based on pigments
  • Removes image backgrounds in the browser using Transformers.js
  • JavaScript animation library for web, animates anything
  • whiteboard and infinite canvas library for React apps
  • modular Rust web renderer for HTML and CSS
  • customizable 3D gradients for React, Figma, and Framer
